name: GTChatPro Live Chat Plugin
author: Glixen Technologies

sections.description:
GtChatPro allows customers to better connect with their visitors (potential customers) in real-time with platforms of live chat (GtChatPro Services).

****Integrated with Different Platforms****

GtchatPro can be easily integrated with CRM, messengers, CMS, Portals, & Support systems. Connect with your leads and customers at one channel and engage with them on their preferred medium.

Mail, Whatsapp, Chat

Increase Leads and Boost Interaction with Triggers

Auto Chat Trigger
Give customers an instant chat trigger to engage them, ask their queries and start communication.

Boost Your Sales

Chat Trigger helps Increase your sales 2x without any extra effort.

How To Get Started with GTchatPro

Free Sign Up

Create a free account now by signing up https://gtchatpro.com/ and starting a 14-day free trial. No credit card is needed to start with the trial.

Create Channel for your Website

After logging in with credentials, create channels and departments of your choice and apply settings across the channels.

Copy Website Chat Widget Code from Channel
Copy the code from that Channel. Paste the code to your website’s footer and the widget will be integrated into the system.

Start Interacting with Customers/Leads
Once the widget code is installed, it’s your time to shine. Start communicating with your leads and customers seamlessly with website chat software.
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gtchatpro directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the GT Chat Pro link in the menu to configure the plugin
  4. Generate the API key from https://gtchatpro.com/ and put it in plugin settings.
sections.faq:
From Where I can get API key?

You can get your API key from https://gtchatpro.com/

Does it has Live Chat option?

Yes, you can have live chat with your client.
